abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Terrie
            O'Leary at the meeting of December 21, 2000 concerning
            the Country Assistance Strategy Progress Report, the interim
            Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper, the HIPC Debt Initiative
            and Decision Point, the Third Fiscal Restructuring and
            Deregulation Program, and  the Technical Assistance Project
            for Malawi.
